meanings.definition: A rank in martial arts, typically denoting a beginner level.
meanings.sent1: In karate class, I just earned my white kyu belt.
meanings.sent2: The dojo awarded him a yellow kyu for his hard work.
meanings.sent3: The little ninja proudly showed off his new kyu to his friends.
meanings.sent4: She felt like a kyu in the world of martial arts, eager to learn and grow.
meanings.sent5: The kyu rank symbolized the start of his journey towards becoming a black belt.

meanings.definition: A Japanese term for the number nine.
meanings.sent1: She counted up to kyu in Japanese, which means nine.
meanings.sent2: The clock struck kyu, signaling the end of the day.
meanings.sent3: He always remembered to buy kyu of his favorite snacks.
meanings.sent4: The cat had kyu lives, just like the old saying goes.
meanings.sent5: The recipe called for kyu eggs to make the perfect omelette.

meanings.definition: A unit of currency in Myanmar, equal to one hundredth of a kyat.
meanings.sent1: He exchanged his dollars for kyu to use in Myanmar.
meanings.sent2: The market displayed the exchange rate for kyu clearly.
meanings.sent3: She found a lucky kyu on the street and decided to keep it.
meanings.sent4: The beggar was grateful for any amount, even a small kyu.
meanings.sent5: The kyu coin gleamed in the sunlight, a tiny piece of Myanmar's economy.
